bibl.title: Multispectral Documentation and Image Processing Analysis of the Papyrus of Tomb II at Daphne, Greece.
bibl.note: 1. Introduction. - 2. Material and methods: 2.1. State of preservation of the papyrus [P. Piraeus Arch. Mus. Inv. ΜΠ 8518; 8520; 8523]; - 2.2. Non-invasive methods and image analysis. - 3. Experimental procedure: 3.1. Documentation; - 3.2. Fragment image enhancement and processing. - 4. Results and discussion. - 5. Conclusion. - Avec résumé en anglais.
bibl.seg: Athina A. Alexopoulou, Agathi-Anthoula Kaminari, Athanasios Panagopoulos & Egert Pöhlmann, Multispectral Documentation and Image Processing Analysis of the Papyrus of Tomb II at Daphne, Greece.
Journal of Archaeological Science 40 (2013) pp. 1242-1249, 16 figg.
